description:
you make your way up, slowly, carefully.

a cry from behind you. you turn. instinctively you clutch the orb.

time slows down. Ohm is slipping, grasping for help.

investigationDescription: <color=purple>do not waste t</color> Ohm's blood runs <color=purple>ime. keep moving.</color> down the rocks <color=purple> but he is fine</color>
